title: Calories in Corona Extra
meta_description: Discover calories in Corona Extra beer per bottle, including carbs, protein, sodium, and quick tweaks for variations.
assumptions: Standard 12 fl oz (355 ml) bottle, original lager, no added lime or mixers.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by serving size, brand batch, and any additions like lime; check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: One 12 oz bottle of Corona Extra has ~148 kcal and ~14 g carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in one Corona Extra?
What are the carbs in Corona Extra?
faqs.a: Approximately 13.9 g carbs per bottle, mostly from malt.

faqs.q: Does Corona Extra have protein or fat?
faqs.a: 1.2 g protein and 0 g fat per bottle.

faqs.q: How much sodium in Corona Extra?
Calories in Corona Extra vs. light version?
faqs.a: Corona Extra has 148 kcal; Light has ~100 kcal per bottle.
